name: RTMMSStatusCodes
title: RTMMS MDC Status Codes
description: The set of statuses of MDC codes maintained in RTMSS plus a status for private codes.

concept.definition: This status indicates that the code is accepted and part of the standard MDC codes.
This status indicates that the code is deprecated and should not be used.
This status indicates that the code is proposed and under consideration for inclusion in the standard MDC codes.
This status indicates that the code is provisional and may be included in the standard MDC codes.
This status indicates that the code is published and part of the standard MDC codes.
This status indicates that the code is withdrawn and should not be used.
This status indicates that the code is rejected and should not be used.
This status indicates that the code is private and not part of the standard MDC codes.
